messages.message:
@Hamish In Q3 (end of October), we are revamping the converse storage and with that all user queries and answers will be automatically persisted. We may need to expose an API to list down all the previous prompts.

cc: @avi

@Hamish can we connect to discuss who the prospect is and what is the use case? Does not having this block adoption? Think there are a few workarounds.
There aren't any near term plans for a chat history API but can build it with them as a design partner
